problem_names: lemma id_matrix_dim: "dim_row (id_matrix nr nc) = nr" "dim_col (id_matrix nr nc) = nc"

lemma row_id_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "row (id_matrix nr nc) i = unit_vec nc i"

lemma unit_eq_0[simp]:
  assumes i: "i \<ge> n"
  shows "unit_vec n i = 0\<^sub>v n"

lemma mult_id_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "(id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = (if i<dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)" (is "?a $ i = ?b")
lemma all1_matrix_dim: "dim_row (all1_matrix nr nc) = nr" "dim_col (all1_matrix nr nc) = nc"

lemma row_all1_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "row (all1_matrix nr nc) i = all1_vec nc"

lemma all1_vec_scalar_prod:
shows "all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> (vec_of_list xs) = sum_list xs"

lemma mult_all1_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "((all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)" (is "?a $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)")
lemma copy_first_matrix_dim: "dim_row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) = nr" "dim_col (copy_first_matrix nr nc) = nc"

lemma row_copy_first_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) i = unit_vec nc 0"

lemma mult_copy_first_matrix:
assumes "i < nr" and "dim_vec v > 0"
shows "(copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0" (is "?a $ i = v $ 0")
translations: lemma id_matrix_dim: "dim_row (id_matrix nr nc) = nr" "dim_col (id_matrix nr nc) = nc"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_row (id_matrix nr nc) = nr &&& dim_col (id_matrix nr nc) = nc
by (simp_all add: id_matrix_def)

lemma row_id_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "row (id_matrix nr nc) i = unit_vec nc i"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. row (id_matrix nr nc) i = unit_vec nc i
by (rule eq_vecI, simp add: assms id_matrix_def unit_vec_def, simp add: id_matrix_dim(2))

lemma unit_eq_0[simp]:
  assumes i: "i \<ge> n"
  shows "unit_vec n i = 0\<^sub>v n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unit_vec n i = 0\<^sub>v n
by (rule eq_vecI, insert i, auto simp: unit_vec_def)

lemma mult_id_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "(id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = (if i<dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)" (is "?a $ i = ?b")

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
have "?a $ i = row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v
using index_mult_mat_vec assms id_matrix_dim

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i < dim_row ?A \<Longrightarrow>
  (?A *\<^sub>v ?v) $ ?i = row ?A ?i \<bullet> ?v
  i < nr
  dim_row (id_matrix ?nr ?nc) = ?nr
  dim_col (id_matrix ?nr ?nc) = ?nc

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
also

proof (state)
this:
  (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
have "... = unit_vec (dim_vec v) i \<bullet> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
    unit_vec (dim_vec v) i \<bullet> v
using row_id_matrix assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i < ?nr \<Longrightarrow> row (id_matrix ?nr ?nc) ?i = unit_vec ?nc ?i
  i < nr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
    unit_vec (dim_vec v) i \<bullet> v
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
  unit_vec (dim_vec v) i \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
also

proof (state)
this:
  row (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
  unit_vec (dim_vec v) i \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
have "... = ?b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unit_vec (dim_vec v) i \<bullet> v =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
using scalar_prod_left_unit carrier_vecI unit_eq_0 scalar_prod_left_zero

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?v \<in> carrier_vec ?n; ?i < ?n\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> unit_vec ?n ?i \<bullet> ?v = ?v $ ?i
  dim_vec ?v = ?n \<Longrightarrow> ?v \<in> carrier_vec ?n
  ?n \<le> ?i \<Longrightarrow> unit_vec ?n ?i = 0\<^sub>v ?n
  ?v \<in> carrier_vec ?n \<Longrightarrow>
  0\<^sub>v ?n \<bullet> ?v = (0::?'a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unit_vec (dim_vec v) i \<bullet> v =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
by fastforce

proof (state)
this:
  unit_vec (dim_vec v) i \<bullet> v = (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (id_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  (if i < dim_vec v then v $ i else 0)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

definition all1_vec::"nat \<Rightarrow> real vec"
where "all1_vec n = vec n (\<lambda>i. 1)"

definition all1_matrix::"nat \<Rightarrow> nat \<Rightarrow> real mat"
where "all1_matrix nr nc = mat nr nc (\<lambda>(r, c). 1)"
lemma all1_matrix_dim: "dim_row (all1_matrix nr nc) = nr" "dim_col (all1_matrix nr nc) = nc"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_row (all1_matrix nr nc) = nr &&& dim_col (all1_matrix nr nc) = nc
by (simp_all add: all1_matrix_def)

lemma row_all1_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "row (all1_matrix nr nc) i = all1_vec nc"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. row (all1_matrix nr nc) i = all1_vec nc
apply (rule eq_vecI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>ia.
       ia < dim_vec (all1_vec nc) \<Longrightarrow>
       row (all1_matrix nr nc) i $ ia = all1_vec nc $ ia
 2. dim_vec (row (all1_matrix nr nc) i) = dim_vec (all1_vec nc)
apply (simp add: all1_matrix_def all1_vec_def assms)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_vec (row (all1_matrix nr nc) i) = dim_vec (all1_vec nc)
by (simp add: all1_matrix_def all1_vec_def)

lemma all1_vec_scalar_prod:
shows "all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> (vec_of_list xs) = sum_list xs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
have "all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> (vec_of_list xs) = (\<Sum>i = 0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs). vec_of_list xs $ i)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs =
    sum (($) (vec_of_list xs)) {0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs)}
unfolding scalar_prod_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Sum>i = 0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs).
        all1_vec (length xs) $ i * vec_of_list xs $ i) =
    sum (($) (vec_of_list xs)) {0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs)}

by (metis (no_types, lifting) all1_vec_def mult_cancel_right1 sum.ivl_cong
    vec.abs_eq dim_vec index_vec vec_of_list.abs_eq)

proof (state)
this:
  all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs =
  sum (($) (vec_of_list xs)) {0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs)}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
also

proof (state)
this:
  all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs =
  sum (($) (vec_of_list xs)) {0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs)}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
have "... = (\<Sum>i = 0..<length xs. xs ! i)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sum (($) (vec_of_list xs)) {0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs)} =
    sum ((!) xs) {0..<length xs}
using vec.abs_eq dim_vec vec_of_list.abs_eq

proof (prove)
using this:
  vec ?xa ?x = Abs_vec (?xa, mk_vec ?xa ?x)
  dim_vec (vec ?n ?f) = ?n
  vec_of_list ?x = Abs_vec (length ?x, mk_vec (length ?x) ((!) ?x))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sum (($) (vec_of_list xs)) {0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs)} =
    sum ((!) xs) {0..<length xs}
by (metis sum.ivl_cong index_vec)

proof (state)
this:
  sum (($) (vec_of_list xs)) {0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs)} =
  sum ((!) xs) {0..<length xs}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
also

proof (state)
this:
  sum (($) (vec_of_list xs)) {0..<dim_vec (vec_of_list xs)} =
  sum ((!) xs) {0..<length xs}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
have "... = sum_list xs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sum ((!) xs) {0..<length xs} = sum_list xs
by (simp add: sum_list_sum_nth)

proof (state)
this:
  sum ((!) xs) {0..<length xs} = sum_list xs

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  all1_vec (length xs) \<bullet> vec_of_list xs = sum_list xs

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma mult_all1_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "((all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)" (is "?a $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)")

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
have "?a $ i = row (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    row (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v
using index_mult_mat_vec assms all1_matrix_dim

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i < dim_row ?A \<Longrightarrow>
  (?A *\<^sub>v ?v) $ ?i = row ?A ?i \<bullet> ?v
  i < nr
  dim_row (all1_matrix ?nr ?nc) = ?nr
  dim_col (all1_matrix ?nr ?nc) = ?nc

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    row (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  row (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
also

proof (state)
this:
  (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  row (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
have "... = sum_list (list_of_vec v)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. row (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
    sum_list (list_of_vec v)
unfolding row_all1_matrix[OF assms]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (dim_vec v) \<bullet> v = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
using all1_vec_scalar_prod[of "list_of_vec v"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  all1_vec (length (list_of_vec v)) \<bullet> vec_of_list (list_of_vec v) =
  sum_list (list_of_vec v)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all1_vec (dim_vec v) \<bullet> v = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
by (metis vec.abs_eq dim_vec vec_list vec_of_list.abs_eq)

proof (state)
this:
  row (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v = sum_list (list_of_vec v)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (all1_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = sum_list (list_of_vec v)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

definition copy_first_matrix::"nat \<Rightarrow> nat \<Rightarrow> real mat"
where "copy_first_matrix nr nc = mat nr nc (\<lambda>(r, c). if c = 0 then 1 else 0)"
lemma copy_first_matrix_dim: "dim_row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) = nr" "dim_col (copy_first_matrix nr nc) = nc"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) = nr &&&
    dim_col (copy_first_matrix nr nc) = nc
by (simp_all add: copy_first_matrix_def)

lemma row_copy_first_matrix:
assumes "i < nr"
shows "row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) i = unit_vec nc 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) i = unit_vec nc 0
apply (rule eq_vecI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>ia.
       ia < dim_vec (unit_vec nc 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) i $ ia = unit_vec nc 0 $ ia
 2. dim_vec (row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) i) = dim_vec (unit_vec nc 0)
apply (auto simp add: copy_first_matrix_def assms)[1]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_vec (row (copy_first_matrix nr nc) i) = dim_vec (unit_vec nc 0)
by (simp add: copy_first_matrix_def)

lemma mult_copy_first_matrix:
assumes "i < nr" and "dim_vec v > 0"
shows "(copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0" (is "?a $ i = v $ 0")

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0
have "?a $ i = row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v
using index_mult_mat_vec assms copy_first_matrix_dim

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i < dim_row ?A \<Longrightarrow>
  (?A *\<^sub>v ?v) $ ?i = row ?A ?i \<bullet> ?v
  i < nr
  0 < dim_vec v
  dim_row (copy_first_matrix ?nr ?nc) = ?nr
  dim_col (copy_first_matrix ?nr ?nc) = ?nc

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
    row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0
also

proof (state)
this:
  (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i =
  row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0
have "... = unit_vec (dim_vec v) 0 \<bullet> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
    unit_vec (dim_vec v) 0 \<bullet> v
using row_copy_first_matrix assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i < ?nr \<Longrightarrow>
  row (copy_first_matrix ?nr ?nc) ?i = unit_vec ?nc 0
  i < nr
  0 < dim_vec v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
    unit_vec (dim_vec v) 0 \<bullet> v
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
  unit_vec (dim_vec v) 0 \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0
also

proof (state)
this:
  row (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v)) i \<bullet> v =
  unit_vec (dim_vec v) 0 \<bullet> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unit_vec (dim_vec v) 0 \<bullet> v = v $ 0
using assms(2) scalar_prod_left_unit carrier_dim_vec

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 < dim_vec v
  \<lbrakk>?v \<in> carrier_vec ?n; ?i < ?n\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> unit_vec ?n ?i \<bullet> ?v = ?v $ ?i
  (?v \<in> carrier_vec ?n) = (dim_vec ?v = ?n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unit_vec (dim_vec v) 0 \<bullet> v = v $ 0
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  unit_vec (dim_vec v) 0 \<bullet> v = v $ 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (copy_first_matrix nr (dim_vec v) *\<^sub>v v) $ i = v $ 0

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
